short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows anime poster previews when hovering over titles on Erai-raws

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enhances your browsing experience by displaying hover preview images of anime posters in Erai-raws.
Simply hover over anime titles on the front page or in lists, and a preview will appear.

Preview size is adjustable.

Source is available at:
https://github.com/strajk-/Erai-Hover-Preview
